amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to prevent American jobs from being moved overseas by reducing the corporate income tax rate.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1029 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1029 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Hatch. (consideration: CR S1995-1997, S2005; text: CR S1996) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to prevent American jobs from being moved overseas by reducing the corporate income tax rate.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1029 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1029 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Hatch.
